item.description:
This week we''ll be enjoying life & company at Buca di Beppo (where Vinny Testas once stood) in Dedham. Come join members and guests in our private room surrounded by colorful pictures and frescoes. Sumptous Italian appetizers and salads will be served. Easy access & plenty of parking.

Directions:

Rte 95 to Exit 15A (Sign reads Rte 1-A,Dedham)Bear RIGHT off the exit and stay in the extreme RIGHT lane. Take the first RIGHT onto Elm Street Fox 25 will be on the right at the corner, and Legacy Place to your left. Plenty of free parking in the front, sides and back
item.name: "Buca di what?" Let's do an "Afterwork" at Buca di Beppo..even the name is fun!
